summary.claim: Surrealist memes represent progression in meme art.

perspectives.text: Surrealist memes are derived from a varied line of modern art traditions.
Surrealist memes challenge their audience to accept that which cannot be easily googled, understood, and shared.
Surreal memes represent progression in meme art.

summary.claim: Surrealist memes represent regression in meme art.

perspectives.text: The nihilism of surreal memes reveals their regressive nature.
Surrealist memes intentionally lack both sense and clarity.
The DNA of surreal memes is self-destructive.

summary.claim: Friends has had a more lasting impact on popular culture and has influenced more successful sitcoms

perspectives.text: The fact that Seinfeld is almost impossible to replicate renders Friends the more influential series, given that it has set the bar and path for the creation of more successful sitcoms.
Without Friends and its focus on friendship, there would be no How I Met Your Mother, New Girl or even The Big Bang Theory, among others.
Netflix paid some $100M to stream the series for 12 months, citing that it was the second-most watched program among American viewers in 2018.

summary.claim: Seinfeld is a groundbreaking show that revolutionized television and made it more acceptable to address taboo issues

perspectives.text: Seinfeld revolutionized television, which is quite impressive for a show “ about nothing.” But it’s precisely because the show’s story lines were about different aspects (and complaints) of everyday life, ranging from the mundane to the controversial, that Seinfeld made such a lasting impact.
The show was especially groundbreaking by boldly and sophisticatedly turning taboo issues, never before addressed on television, into comic gold.
